author: Stephen
comment: I was hoping for an app like this on my watch. Very convenient. The only problem is that the button at the bottom of the screen is cut off on the Moto 360 due to the "flat tire." Still usable, and still cool. If you need a simple chord ref for your phone, then this is a good choice.

reply.author: Andre Löffelmann
reply.content: Hi Stephen, thanks for your rating and the comment on the moto 360 problem! In order to solve it I would really appreciate your help. Just send me an email with a pic of the screen if you don't mind (andre.loeffelmann@googlemail.com). I'll try to fix it asap.

title: Good app, one flaw on Moto 360

author: Matt Manion
comment: Really handy app for an intermediate guitar player!
